item.title: Gubarev-speculation
item.description: The 21st century will be the “wormwood century” for the masses. The trends are obvious. The rich will become richer and more influential. They will have access to very expensive biomedical technologies that enable them to live longer and healthier lives than the masses. Only the rich upper classes will be able to afford to give their children healthy food and supplements. Only they will be able to truly educate their children.
